It may also touch on aspects of communication policy, but "Hardware" feels like the right choice here.**Deciding on Ticket Categories**

Overall, I feel this ticket would best fit under the "Internal Project" category since it’s focused on establishing a client communication channel.**Categorizing the Ticket**
